item.description:
The Boston Book Festival is hosting a Literary Pub Trivia fundraiser on August 6 from 6:30-8:30 at Tommy Doyle's in Kendall Square. The format is similar (although not identical) to Stump Trivia, and Meghna Chakrabarti from WBUR will be the trivia jockey. Teams are limited to 4/team.

Because this is a fundraiser, it's $12 in advance or $15 at the door to play, but all proceeds go to the Boston Book Festival. We're also giving away more than $1000 in gift cards and prizes (from the Boston Book Festival, WBUR, Tommy Doyle's, and a bunch of area bookstores) to the top three scoring teams as well as the team with the best name, so it could definitely be a profitable night for participants!

The link for registering and pre-payment (save $3!) is here: http://www.bostonbookfest.org/bookfest/schedule_detail/schedule_literary_trivia_night/

When you register, put "Pub Trivia Meetup" in the "team name" field, and we'll try to place you on the same team (don't worry--you can always change your team name to something more creative once you're there!).
item.name: Boston Book Festival Literary Pub Trivia
